messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] ear model, help?
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/5/00 2:36:33 AM Central Daylight Time, panchot@premier1.net writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/5/00 2:36:33 AM Central Daylight Time,
panchot@... writes:

<< Hello all, I am trying to find somewhere that I can buy a model of the
ear/inner ear. My four year old daughter is REALLY interested in learning
how the ear works, and I would love to get a model for her. >>

Brynn,
Try asking your pediatrician. They often get these models from drug reps -
you've probably seen them sitting on the counters in the little examining
room. If you overlook the drug company's logo on the side of it, they are
pretty decent models. Maybe she/he would let you have one, or at least
borrow one for awhile.



*** KiM ***
runs with scissors
